title: You Have A Defender | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: You Have A Defender | Joel Osteen
description:
If you’re constantly trying to defend yourself against people, you’ll get distracted into fighting battles you were never meant to fight. Instead, let God be your defender. When you stay in peace, He will fight your battles for you. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
